Title: Requires the New York state thruway authority to provide notifications to customers for E-ZPass transactions
Summary: Requires the New York state thruway authority to provide notifications to customers for E-ZPass transactions.
LawCode: Add ยง378-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York state thruway authority to provide notifications to customers for E-ZPass transactions
